title: 3 Star Khazix is a wacky unit
body:
Clip 1 (live server): https://clips.twitch.tv/AwkwardKnottyMacaroniM4xHeh
Clip 2 (PBE a few weeks ago, shows it a bit better): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sniIEkc-c5w
He kind of just teleports around with no animation. He also turns truly invisible to the point where both players can't see him. I also encountered that instead of teleporting quickly, he walks around slowly (like a normal walk) for his ult on ghost boards.

replies.body:
I recently got to watch a Volibear with 2 deathcap stand in place and oneshot each unit in succession with his ability, from across the board.

TFT is whack.
I feel like that is hardcountered by having an MR item so he doesn't get the reset

That won't do a thing, seeing as his ult does physical damage. And countering him with armor doesn't really help either, since he's desert and with just one more desert unit your armor doesn't mean shit anymore.
